e: 例⃝「`他~`知道~`這~`件~`事~`的~`來龍去脈~`後~，`誤會~`冰釋~」。
d.f: `原~`指~`山脈~`起伏~`如~`龍~`一樣~`的~`形勢~。`後~`比喻~`事物~`發生~`的~`全部~`過程~`和~`因果~`關係~。

Deutsch: Zusammenhänge, Hergang, Kontext, Entwicklungshintergrund und Tendenz  (S, Sprichw)
English: lit. mountain has a connecting pulse throughout like a dragon (idiom, from fengshui); sequence of events
where sth comes from and where it goes
